title: An Act to designate the courthouse in the Roxbury section of the city of Boston as the Edward O. Gourdin Courthouse

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Tyler of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2016) of Chynah Tyler for legislation to designate the courthouse in the Roxbury section of the city of Boston as the Edward O. Gourdin courthouse.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-02:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                                       and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
